pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, September 12, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, September 12, 2016

Ottawa

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks to recognize Eid al-Adha

Ottawa Muslim Association
251 Northwestern Ave.
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media should arrive for 9:45 a.m.

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
